column7: South}}</ref> aged 113 years) was the fourteenth [[Ruling Steward]] of [[Gondor]].

Húrin: Elendil}}</ref>  His name came from a hero of that time, [[Húrin
column4: West}}</ref>  He was actually the third of his family with this name, preceded by [[Húrin of Emyn Arnen]] (the founder of the house of the Stewards) and [[Húrin I]] (one of the Stewards who had ruled during the [[Watchful Peace]]).<ref>{{App

{{disambig-more: Húrin ruled [[Gondor]] as its Steward for twenty-three years, and was succeeded by his son, [[Belecthor I]].<ref name="South"/>
